title: Experts say we could see the worst energy crisis since the 1970s
description: CNN's Jake Tapper looks into how climate change and the pandemic may lead us into a global energy crisis heading into the winter.

title: Complaint alleging sex crime filed against Andrew Cuomo
description: A misdemeanor complaint alleging a sex crime has been filed against former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo, who resigned from his post after multiple women came forward alleging inappropriate touching.

title: GOP lawmaker chased out of party over climate change speaks out
description: Climate change denial goes back further than you think. The latest "Reality Check with John Avlon," traces how climate change denial has grown over decades despite growing scientific evidence. From a 1965 memo on LBJ's desk to Exxon's internal company memos in the 1970's, the danger has been clear. CNN's Bill Weir and former GOP Congressman Bob Inglis join Avlon for an inside look.

title: Lawmaker reveals full trunk of rice during questioning of oil executives
description: Rep. Katie Porter (D-CA) used a trunk full of rice to question oil executives about the amount of unused oil permits on federal land.

title: Senior US general warns China's military progress is 'stunning'
Mitt Romney and Kyrsten Sinema re-enact Ted Lasso 'biscuits with the boss'
description: Sen. Mitt Romney laced up his boots and put on his best Ted Lasso for Halloween, fake mustache and all.

title: Analysis: Why WSJ never should have published Trump's letter on 2020 election
description: On Wednesday, the Wall Street Journal opinion's section posted a lengthy letter from Donald Trump in which the former president repeatedly pushed conspiracy theories about the 2020 election in Pennsylvania.

title: Ava DuVernay says a microaggression changed how she dresses
description: Award-winning filmmaker Ava DuVernay tells CNN's Christiane Amanpour about her new Colin Kaepernick series and a microaggression that changed the way she dresses.

title: Flight organizer convicted in crash that caused death of soccer star Emiliano Sala
description: David Henderson, who organized the flight that crashed and left soccer player Emiliano Sala and pilot David Ibbotson dead, has been found guilty of endangering the safety of the aircraft, Cardiff Crown Court confirmed to CNN on Thursday.

title: France shuts its ports to UK fishing boats
description: French authorities stopped and fined two British vessels fishing in French waters Wednesday, diverting one to a French port, the French Minister for the Sea Annick Girardin tweeted early Thursday morning.

title: Senior US general warns China's military progress is 'stunning'
description:
• Watch: President of Taiwan confirms US troops are training military on the island 
• China warns US that 'Taiwan independence is a dead end' in response to CNN interview

title: Surprise: This couple had an Oscar-winning wedding crasher
description: After spotting a beach wedding in Santa Monica, iconic actor Tom Hanks decided to congratulate the newly weds.

title: Assault on flight attendant 'one of the worst' in airline's history, American Airlines CEO says
description: A coast-to-coast flight was diverted to Denver on Wednesday night after a passenger "physically assaulted a flight attendant," American Airlines said in a statement.

title: What Biden said to the nation ahead of trip to Europe
description: President Joe Biden addressed the nation ahead of an overseas trip laying out the framework for his agenda moving forward.

title: Why Biden's historically low approval ratings matter
description: President Joe Biden's approval rating has taken a tumble since his first days in office -- to the second-worst of any recent president during this point in his first term. In the latest episode of The Point, CNN's Chris Cillizza explains why Biden's numbers are so low, and what this could mean for Democrats in 2022.

title: Fan rushes stage to hug Adam Levine. Watch how he reacts
description: Maroon 5 lead singer Adam Levine says he was "startled" after a fan jumped onstage and grabbed him after the incident went viral on TikTok. HLN's Melissa Knowles explains.

title: Analyst on Trump's WSJ letter: He doesn't care if he seems desperate
description: CNN analyst Maggie Haberman speaks with CNN's Brianna Keilar and John Berman to discuss former President Donald Trump's letter to the editor of The Wall Street Journal.

title: Widow of Olympian gives birth to his child 15 months after his death
description: Ellidy Pullin, the partner of Australian Olympic snowboarder Alex "Chumpy" Pullin, has given birth to their daughter 15 months after his death last year.

title: Ted Cruz defends a parent's use of Nazi salute
description: Senator Ted Cruz (R-TX) defended a parent's use of a Nazi salute while he questioned US Attorney General Merrick Garland. They were discussing Garland's memo that called for investigations into potential violence against school staff.

title: G20 Rome Summit: What will be on the agenda?
description: Leaders from the world's 20 leading economies are flying in to Rome for their first in person G20 Summit since the pandemic. Top of the agenda is the pandemic -- but what actual progress has been made since last year's virtual summit in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia? CNN's Nic Robertson has more.
